name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Celebration of Musical Diversity**  

Best Kept Secret 2026 promises an eclectic lineup of 52 artists spanning a broad spectrum of genres, with a strong focus on innovation and boundary-pushing sounds. From electronic and post-punk to hip-hop and alternative rock, the festival offers a rich blend of styles, ensuring something for every music lover. Notably, electronic music leads the pack with six acts, followed by post-punk and hip-hop with five artists each, showcasing the festival's commitment to both modern and experimental genres.  

Diversity shines not only in musical styles but also in representation. The lineup features artists from 16 countries, with the USA, Netherlands, and UK leading the charge, alongside acts from Ghana, South Africa, Brazil, and more, reflecting the festival's global appeal. While male artists make up the largest gender group, female, non-binary, and mixed-gender acts are also well-represented, adding unique perspectives to the stage. Furthermore, 12 artists identify as people of color, highlighting the festival's effort to amplify diverse voices.  

With an impressive 98.1% of artists connected to Spotify, attendees can easily explore the lineup and discover their next favorite act. The festival's average artist rating of 7.2, based on 76.9% of rated acts, reflects a high standard of quality, with the majority of ratings falling in the 7-8 range or higher. Best Kept Secret 2026 continues its legacy as a hub for musical discovery, cultural inclusion, and eclectic artistry.
